sections.text: of certain churches or religious organizations or individuals.

sections.heading: As used in this act:(1)“Government” or “state” includes any branch, department, agency, instrumentality, or official or other person acting under color of law of the state, a county, special district, municipality, or any other subdivision of the state
sections.text: (2)“Demonstrates” means to meet the burden of g
